statements: DELETE FROM car_testing_results WHERE test_type = 'Acceleration Test';
DELETE FROM car_testing_results WHERE prototype_id = 100 AND test_type = 'Acceleration';
DELETE FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE prototype_id = 200 AND handling_rating < 5;
DELETE FROM CarPrototypes WHERE prototype_id = 100 AND car_model = 'SUV'
DELETE FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE acceleration > 200 AND handling_rating >= 4
DELETE FROM PrototypeEngineInfo WHERE horsepower > 300 AND engine_type = 'V8';
DELETE FROM prototype_photos WHERE prototype_id = 10 AND photo_url = 'http://example.com/photo1.jpg';
